title: smokincrypto
author: smokincrypto
content: Firepot Finance is revolutionizing DeFi by making it accessible to everyone, even those familiar with traditional finance. Our mission is to simplify DeFi through innovative mechanisms like AI copilots, Robo Advisory, and the Omni Chain dWallet.
